column3:
男子禁制のゲルドの街に潜入した男が
カラカラバザールのどこかにいるらしい

目撃情報を集め
その男を見つけ出そう
column4:
You heard of a man at the Kara Kara Bazaar
who found a way to sneak into Gerudo Town,
a place men are forbidden from entering.

Try and locate some people who know
his whereabouts.

column3:
ゲルドの街への潜入に成功した！

淑女の服に着替えることで
門番たちの目をごまかすことが出来たようだ
column4:
You snuck into Gerudo Town successfully!

You were able to fool the town guards by
disguising yourself in a Gerudo outfit.

column3:
ゲルドの街に潜入した男を探しだし
淑女の服を手に入れた

これを着ていると
イイ女になれるらしい…
column4:
You were able to find the man who snuck into
Gerudo Town, and you got a Gerudo outfit
from him.

Put that on and you'll be able to pass
for a woman while you're wearing it...
